description: Diamond patterns in broken Vert. Lines with targets & leaves. Rpt. 35" Royale cloth.  Drk orange designs on olive green grometrics. Brown bkg.  35" vert. Rpt. Paprika
image_copyright: Â© Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Anthony Ballatore%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: The colors, textures, materials, and techniques of urban North African fabrics often reflect the influence of European sources and provide a dramatic contrast to the textiles produced in Sub-Saharan regions. Based on two of the motifs from <I>Tropic of Capricorn<I>, <I>Fez<I> effectively conveys the essence of the luxurious lampas weave fabrics that are prized in urban Moroccan culture.
title: Fez
